text:
S.No. | Question | Solution Area | Type | User | Answer | Created by | Created on
1.0 | What is Zigtal Skill Intelligence? | General | General |  | Zigtal Skill Intelligence is a platform that helps employees improve skills, gain insights into their career path, and enhance performance for exponential professional growth within their organization. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
2.0 | What solutions does Skill Intelligence provide? | General | General |  | It provides skill analysis, career path guidance, mentoring, learning journeys, project assignments, and team management tools to help employees and organizations grow. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
3.0 | What is the Dashboard used for? | Dashboard | Feature |  | The Dashboard gives you an overview of your skills, learning progress, career path, mentoring engagements, and projects in one place. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
4.0 | What can I do in the Skills section? | Skills | Feature |  | In Skills, you can view and manage your skills, analyze your strengths and gaps, and respond to skill rating requests from others. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
5.0 | How does Skill Analysis work? | Skills → Skill Anal

nd manage your skills, analyze your strengths and gaps, and respond to skill rating requests from others. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
5.0 | How does Skill Analysis work? | Skills → Skill Analysis | How-to |  | Skill Analysis helps you identify current skill levels, compare against role requirements, and find areas for improvement. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
6.0 | What is the purpose of My Learnings? | My Learnings | Feature |  | My Learnings is where you can track assigned or self-chosen learning programs that help bridge your skill gaps. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
7.0 | What is My Career Path? | My Career Path | Feature |  | My Career Path shows personalized career progression based on your skills, interests, and organizational opportunities. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
8.0 | What is Mentoring in Skill Intelligence? | Mentoring | General |  | Mentoring connects you with mentors and mentees to guide skill development, share experiences, and support career growth. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
9.0 | How can I find a mentor? | Mentoring → Find Mentors | How-to |  | Go to the Find Mentors page, search for mentors based on expertise, and sen

career growth. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
9.0 | How can I find a mentor? | Mentoring → Find Mentors | How-to |  | Go to the Find Mentors page, search for mentors based on expertise, and send a connection request. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
10.0 | What is My Projects section? | My Projects | Feature |  | My Projects lists your current projects, allows you to track progress, and align them with your skill and career goals. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
11.0 | How do I explore future roles in My Career Path? | My Career Path | How-to |  | Go to My Career Path, select a target role, and review required skills and gaps to prepare for that role. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
12.0 | What is Mentoring in Skill Intelligence? | Mentoring | General |  | Mentoring connects you with mentors and mentees to guide skill development, share experiences, and support career growth. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
13.0 | How can I find a mentor? | Mentoring → Find Mentors | How-to |  | Go to the Find Mentors page, search for mentors based on expertise, and send a connection request. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
14.0 | What is My Mentors page? | Mentoring

ntors | How-to |  | Go to the Find Mentors page, search for mentors based on expertise, and send a connection request. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
14.0 | What is My Mentors page? | Mentoring → My Mentors | Feature |  | The My Mentors page lists all mentors you are connected with and lets you manage ongoing mentorships. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
15.0 | What is My Mentees page? | Mentoring → My Mentees | Feature |  | The My Mentees page shows all employees who consider you their mentor, helping you guide their growth. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
16.0 | What is My Projects section? | My Projects | Feature |  | My Projects lists your current projects, allows you to track progress, and align them with your skill and career goals. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
17.0 | How do I get assigned to a project? | My Projects | How-to |  | You can be assigned to projects by managers through Manage My Team, or request alignment based on your skills. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
18.0 | What information is stored in My Profile? | Profile Details → My Profile | Feature |  | My Profile contains your personal and professional details like name, role, skills, a

2025-09-16 00:00:00
18.0 | What information is stored in My Profile? | Profile Details → My Profile | Feature |  | My Profile contains your personal and professional details like name, role, skills, and contact information. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
19.0 | How do I update my qualifications? | Profile Details → Qualifications | How-to |  | Go to Qualifications to add or edit your education, certifications, and training achievements. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
20.0 | How do I update my work history? | Profile Details → Work History | How-to |  | Use the Work History and Resume page to add past roles, experiences, and upload your resume. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
21.0 | What is a Mentor Profile? | Profile Details → Mentor Profile | Feature |  | Mentor Profile highlights your skills and experience as a mentor, visible to employees looking for guidance. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
22.0 | What is a Mentee Profile? | Profile Details → Mentee Profile | Feature |  | Mentee Profile shows your learning goals and skill gaps to mentors who can help guide you. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
23.0 | What is Manage My Team used for? | Manage My Team |

Feature |  | Mentee Profile shows your learning goals and skill gaps to mentors who can help guide you. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
23.0 | What is Manage My Team used for? | Manage My Team | Feature |  | Manage My Team lets managers view team members, analyze their skills, assign projects, and create learning journeys. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
24.0 | How can I assign a project to my team member? | Manage My Team | How-to |  | In Manage My Team, select a team member, choose Assign Project, and link them to a project role. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
25.0 | How do I create a Learning Journey for my team? | Manage My Team | How-to |  | Open Manage My Team, pick a member, and use “Create a Learning Journey” to assign skill-based learning paths. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
26.0 | What is Group Engagement? | Group Engagement | Feature |  | Group Engagement allows employees to collaborate, share knowledge, and engage in team-wide initiatives. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
27.0 | How do I participate in Group Engagement? | Group Engagement | How-to |  | Go to the Group Engagements page, join an active group, and contribute through discussions a

ain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
27.0 | How do I participate in Group Engagement? | Group Engagement | How-to |  | Go to the Group Engagements page, join an active group, and contribute through discussions and shared tasks. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
28.0 | Can I track my progress over time? | Dashboard | Feature |  | Yes, the Dashboard shows charts and metrics on your skill growth, completed learnings, and career progress. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
29.0 | How does the platform recommend roles for me? | Career Path / Skill Analysis | Feature |  | Based on your skills, interests, and role matches, the system recommends roles you are suitable for. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-16 00:00:00
30.0 | What is the Admin Dashboard used for? | Dashboard | Feature |  | The Admin Dashboard provides an overview of organizational skills, job roles, employee distribution, assessments, and engagement metrics. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
31.0 | What can I do in Job Roles? | Job Roles | Feature |  | In Job Roles, admins can create, update, and manage role definitions, required skills, and proficiency levels to align employees with organizational needs. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00

Feature |  | In Job Roles, admins can create, update, and manage role definitions, required skills, and proficiency levels to align employees with organizational needs. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
32.0 | How do I add a new Job Role? | Job Roles | How-to |  | Go to Job Roles, click “Add Job Role,” enter the role details, assign required skills with proficiency levels, and save. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
33.0 | What is the Skills section for Admins? | Skills | Feature |  | The Skills section allows admins to define, categorize, and update organizational skills to standardize assessments and role requirements. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
34.0 | How do I add a new Skill? | Skills | How-to |  | Go to Skills, select “Add Skill,” enter the skill name, category, description, and proficiency levels, then save. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
35.0 | What are Assessments in the Admin panel? | Assessments | Feature |  | Assessments let admins design and manage skill evaluations for roles, projects, and employees to measure proficiency levels. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
36.0 | How do I create a new Assessment? | Assessments | How-to |  | Open Assessm

ill evaluations for roles, projects, and employees to measure proficiency levels. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
36.0 | How do I create a new Assessment? | Assessments | How-to |  | Open Assessments, click “Create Assessment,” select job role/skills, configure scoring, and assign to employees. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
37.0 | What is the Projects section for Admins? | Projects | Feature |  | Projects in Admin help assign employees to organizational projects, track skill alignment, and monitor progress. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
38.0 | How can I assign employees to a Project? | Projects | How-to |  | Go to Projects, select a project, and use “Assign Employees” to map members based on required skills. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
39.0 | What is the Employees section for Admins? | Employees | Feature |  | The Employees section lists all users, their profiles, skills, and career data, allowing admins to manage workforce information. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
40.0 | How do I add a new Employee? | Employees | How-to |  | In Employees, click “Add Employee,” fill in details such as name, email, role, and assign initial job role and skills. | S

-09-17 00:00:00
40.0 | How do I add a new Employee? | Employees | How-to |  | In Employees, click “Add Employee,” fill in details such as name, email, role, and assign initial job role and skills. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
41.0 | What is Engagements in Admin panel? | Engagements | Feature |  | Engagements allow admins to create and manage group-wide initiatives, team-building activities, and collaborative programs. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
42.0 | How do I create a new Engagement? | Engagements | How-to |  | Go to Engagements, click “Create Engagement,” add details such as title, description, team members, and timeline, then publish. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
43.0 | What is My Organisation page? | Account Settings → My Organisation | Feature |  | My Organisation page contains organizational details like company profile, departments, policies, and branding. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
44.0 | How do I update My Organisation details? | Account Settings → My Organisation | How-to |  | Open My Organisation, edit the company details or branding, and save changes. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
45.0 | What is All Logs in Account Settings? |

tings → My Organisation | How-to |  | Open My Organisation, edit the company details or branding, and save changes. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
45.0 | What is All Logs in Account Settings? | Account Settings → All Logs | Feature |  | All Logs shows a history of changes in roles, skills, employees, and assessments for audit and compliance purposes. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
46.0 | How do I check recent changes in the system? | Account Settings → All Logs | How-to |  | Go to All Logs, filter by date or category (roles, employees, assessments), and review the change history. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
47.0 | What is the Chat option in Engagements? | Engagements | Feature |  | The Chat option allows employees to directly interact with their mentors or engagement members in real time, facilitating continuous communication and guidance. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
48.0 | How do I use the Chat option in Engagements? | Engagements | How-to |  | Open an active Engagement, click on the Chat tab, type your message, and communicate instantly with your mentor or peers. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
49.0 | What is the Mentor-Mentee Engagement Report?

tive Engagement, click on the Chat tab, type your message, and communicate instantly with your mentor or peers. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
49.0 | What is the Mentor-Mentee Engagement Report? | Engagements → Mentor/Mentee Engagement | Feature |  | The Mentor-Mentee Engagement Report provides an overview of the mentoring relationship, showing goals, activities, feedback, and progress updates. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
50.0 | Who can view the Mentor-Mentee Engagement Report? | Engagements → Mentor/Mentee Engagement | General |  | Both the mentor and the mentee have access to the report, ensuring transparency of all activities and progress during the engagement. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
51.0 | What information is included in the Engagement Report? | Engagements → Mentor/Mentee Engagement | Feature |  | The Engagement Report includes activity logs, chat history, milestones achieved, skills worked on, and overall progress of the engagement. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
52.0 | What is the Chat option in Engagements? | Engagements | Feature |  | The Chat option allows employees to directly interact with their mentors or engagement members in real ti

52.0 | What is the Chat option in Engagements? | Engagements | Feature |  | The Chat option allows employees to directly interact with their mentors or engagement members in real time, facilitating continuous communication and guidance. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
53.0 | How do I use the Chat option in Engagements? | Engagements | How-to |  | Open an active Engagement, click on the Chat tab, type your message, and communicate instantly with your mentor or peers. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
54.0 | What is the Mentor-Mentee Engagement Report? | Engagements → Mentor/Mentee Engagement | Feature |  | The Mentor-Mentee Engagement Report provides an overview of the mentoring relationship, showing goals, activities, feedback, and progress updates. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
55.0 | Who can view the Mentor-Mentee Engagement Report? | Engagements → Mentor/Mentee Engagement | General |  | Both the mentor and the mentee have access to the report, ensuring transparency of all activities and progress during the engagement. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
56.0 | What information is included in the Engagement Report? | Engagements → Mentor/Mentee

ing transparency of all activities and progress during the engagement. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
56.0 | What information is included in the Engagement Report? | Engagements → Mentor/Mentee Engagement | Feature |  | The Engagement Report includes activity logs, chat history, milestones achieved, skills worked on, and overall progress of the engagement. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
57.0 | How do I compare my skills with job role requirements? | Skills → Skill Analysis | How-to |  | Go to Skill Analysis, select a target job role, and the system will highlight your current proficiency versus required levels to identify gaps. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
58.0 | Can I bookmark skills I want to improve? | Skills | Feature |  | Yes, you can mark skills as “Focus Skills” to track them separately and get tailored learning recommendations. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
59.0 | How do I track my learning progress? | My Learnings | Feature |  | My Learnings shows your completion percentage, milestones, and deadlines for each assigned or self-chosen program. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
60.0 | How do I explore aspirational roles in My Career Path? | My Ca

ur completion percentage, milestones, and deadlines for each assigned or self-chosen program. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
60.0 | How do I explore aspirational roles in My Career Path? | My Career Path | How-to |  | Open My Career Path, select an aspirational role, and view the required skills, current gaps, and recommended learning journeys. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
61.0 | Can I track multiple career paths at the same time? | My Career Path | General |  | Yes, you can add more than one aspirational role to track progress across multiple career growth opportunities. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
62.0 | What is Group Engagement used for? | Group Engagement | Feature |  | Group Engagement enables employees to collaborate on knowledge sharing, discussions, and collective problem-solving within groups. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
63.0 | How do I participate in a Group Engagement discussion? | Group Engagement | How-to |  | Go to the Group Engagements page, join an active group, and use the chat/discussion board to contribute. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
64.0 | What details can I update in My Profile? | Profile Details → My Profile | Feature

e, join an active group, and use the chat/discussion board to contribute. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
64.0 | What details can I update in My Profile? | Profile Details → My Profile | Feature |  | You can update your personal details, role, contact information, profile photo, and social links such as LinkedIn or GitHub. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
65.0 | Can I add certifications to my profile? | Profile Details → Qualifications | How-to |  | Yes, you can upload certifications or manually enter details under Qualifications, which may also be verified by admins. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
66.0 | How do I add my past work experience? | Profile Details → Work History | How-to |  | Go to Work History, click Add Experience, and fill in details about your previous roles. You can also upload resumes for reference. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
67.0 | What is the difference between Mentor and Mentee Profiles? | Profile Details → Mentor/Mentee Profiles | General |  | Mentor Profiles highlight your expertise for guiding others, while Mentee Profiles display your goals and gaps for seeking guidance. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
68.0 | How do managers u

|  | Mentor Profiles highlight your expertise for guiding others, while Mentee Profiles display your goals and gaps for seeking guidance. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
68.0 | How do managers use Manage My Team? | Manage My Team | Feature |  | Managers can view team members, analyze their skill gaps, assign projects, and create learning journeys directly from this section. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
69.0 | Can managers assign mentors to employees? | Manage My Team | How-to |  | Yes, managers can match employees with suitable mentors based on skill gaps and learning goals within Manage My Team. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
70.0 | How are projects linked to skills? | My Projects | Feature |  | Projects are mapped to required skills, so completing them helps you build proficiency and bridge gaps aligned with your career path. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
71.0 | Can I request to join a project? | My Projects | How-to |  | Yes, you can request to be aligned to projects that match your skills or career goals, subject to manager approval. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
72.0 | How can I request my manager to rate my skills? | My Skills → Rating Reques

to projects that match your skills or career goals, subject to manager approval. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
72.0 | How can I request my manager to rate my skills? | My Skills → Rating Requests | How-to |  | Open the Skills page, select the skill you want rated, and send a rating request directly to your manager. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
73.0 | Can I ask peers to rate my skills? | My Skills → Rating Requests | Feature |  | Yes, you can send rating requests to any colleague, and their feedback will be added to your skill profile. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
74.0 | How do managers assign a Learning Journey to team members? | Manage My Team → Learning Journeys | How-to |  | Managers can open Manage My Team, select a team member, and assign a Learning Journey mapped to a specific role or skill. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
75.0 | Can a Learning Journey be customized by managers? | Manage My Team → Learning Journeys | Feature |  | Yes, managers can personalize a Learning Journey by adding, removing, or reordering skill-based learnings for each team member. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
76.0 | What is the Admin Dashboard used for? | Admin → Da

onalize a Learning Journey by adding, removing, or reordering skill-based learnings for each team member. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
76.0 | What is the Admin Dashboard used for? | Admin → Dashboard | Feature |  | The Admin Dashboard provides organization-wide insights into employees, skills, job roles, assessments, projects, and engagement activities. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
77.0 | How do admins manage Job Roles? | Admin → Job Roles | Feature |  | Admins can create, edit, and update job roles, define required skills for each role, and align employees to those roles. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
78.0 | What can admins do in the Skills section? | Admin → Skills | Feature |  | Admins can add new skills, edit existing skills, set proficiency levels, and map them to job roles and assessments. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
79.0 | How are Assessments managed by admins? | Admin → Assessments | Feature |  | Admins can create and assign assessments to employees, link them to skills or roles, and generate reports on results. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
80.0 | What is the purpose of Projects in Admin? | Admin → Projects | Feature |  | Admins can o

ees, link them to skills or roles, and generate reports on results. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
80.0 | What is the purpose of Projects in Admin? | Admin → Projects | Feature |  | Admins can oversee all organizational projects, track employee assignments, and align projects with strategic goals. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
81.0 | How do admins manage Employees? | Admin → Employees | Feature |  | Admins can view employee profiles, update details, manage access permissions, and align employees to roles and projects. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
83.0 | What settings are available under My Organisation? | Admin → Account Settings → My Organisation | Feature |  | Admins can configure organization details, branding, role hierarchies, and other account-level preferences. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
84.0 | What is All Logs in Account Settings? | Admin → Account Settings → All Logs | Feature |  | All Logs provide a history of changes across the platform, including updates to employees, skills, roles, and projects. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
85.0 | What are Assessments in the platform? | Assessments | Feature |  | Assessments are structured evaluat

ing updates to employees, skills, roles, and projects. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
85.0 | What are Assessments in the platform? | Assessments | Feature |  | Assessments are structured evaluations that test employees’ knowledge, skills, or readiness. They can be part of a Learning Journey or standalone mandatory checkpoints in a Program. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
86.0 | How are Assessments used in Learning Journeys? | Assessments → Learning Journey | Feature |  | Within a Learning Journey, Assessments validate whether employees have mastered the skills or concepts before moving to the next stage. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
87.0 | What is a Program-level Assessment? | Assessments → Programs | Feature |  | A Program-level Assessment acts as a gateway evaluation. Employees must clear it to unlock specific Learning Journeys or advanced modules. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
88.0 | Who can assign Assessments? | Assessments | General |  | Admins and Managers can assign Assessments to individuals or teams as part of a Learning Journey, Program, or targeted skill validation. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
89.0 | Can I retake an Assessment if I fail

rs can assign Assessments to individuals or teams as part of a Learning Journey, Program, or targeted skill validation. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
89.0 | Can I retake an Assessment if I fail? | Assessments | General |  | Yes, depending on the rules set by the Admin or Manager, employees may be allowed multiple attempts to pass an Assessment. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
90.0 | What happens if I don’t clear a Program-level Assessment? | Assessments → Programs | General |  | If you don’t clear the Program-level Assessment, the associated Learning Journey or modules remain locked until you successfully pass. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
91.0 | Are Assessment results visible to managers? | Assessments | General |  | Yes, Assessment results are visible to Managers and Admins for tracking employee progress, while employees can only see their own performance. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
92.0 | What types of Assessments are available? | Assessments | Feature |  | Assessments may include multiple-choice questions, case studies, practical tasks, or project submissions depending on the skill or role being evaluated. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
93.0

|  | Assessments may include multiple-choice questions, case studies, practical tasks, or project submissions depending on the skill or role being evaluated. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
93.0 | How do Assessments contribute to skill ratings? | Assessments → Skills | Feature |  | Successful completion of Assessments automatically updates skill proficiency scores, providing a data-backed measure of growth. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
94.0 | Can Assessments be linked to Certifications? | Assessments → Certifications | Feature |  | Yes, clearing specific Assessments may grant employees digital Certificates, which can be used for recognition or compliance purposes. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-17 00:00:00
95.0 | How user can reset password? | Forgot Password | Functional |  | User can reset password form the Forgot Password link present on the Login Page | Sunil Patel | 2025-09-18 00:00:00
96.0 | How user can view the Work History | Profile Details --> Work History & Resume | Navigational |  | User can view the Work History from the Work History and Resume option inside Profile Details dropdown in the Menu links | Sunil Patel | 2025-09-18 00:00:00
97.0 | How user can upload

avigational |  | User can view the Work History from the Work History and Resume option inside Profile Details dropdown in the Menu links | Sunil Patel | 2025-09-18 00:00:00
97.0 | How user can upload Resume | Profile Details --> Work History & Resume | Functional |  | User can upload the Resume from the Work History and Resume option inside Profile Details dropdown in the Menu links | Sunil Patel | 2025-09-18 00:00:00
98.0 | What is maximum count of Resume upload | Profile Details --> Work History & Resume | Functional |  | User can upload unlimited Resume. There is no limit. We hold upto the last 3 | Sunil Patel | 2025-09-18 00:00:00
99.0 | How do I change my password? | Account Settings → Security | How-to |  | Go to Account Settings → Security → Change Password and follow the prompts. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-19 00:00:00
100.0 | Does Zigtal support Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)? | Account Settings → Security | Technical |  | Yes, Zigtal supports 2FA via authenticator apps or SMS. | Sambhav Jain | 2025-09-19 00:00:00

123.0 | How do I create a Zigtal account?
 What are the steps I need to follow to create a new account on Zigtal for the first time?
 Can you guide me on how to register myself on Zigtal and activate my account?
 I am a new user. How do I sign up on Zigtal and get started? |  | Generic |  | There are different ways of creating a Zigtal account. If you are an enterprise user and the Zigtal platform is integrated into your HRIS through Single sign on, then you do not need to register. You can directly access the Zigtal portal on clicking a dedicated tile/link in your HRIS account. In case you are an individual user, you can click on the link www.zigtal.ai and register yourself into the portal. You will be guided through out the process by an intuitive registration workflow in the Zigtal portal. | Raktim Dutta

124.0 | How do I update my profile on Zigtal?
 Where can I edit my personal and professional details in Zigtal?
 What is the process for changing my information such as skills or job history in Zigtal?
 How do I keep my profile updated so that the platform recommends accurate roles and learning? |  | Generic |  | To update your profile, log in to Zigtal and go to the Profile tab. Click Edit Profile to change your details such as skills, work experience, certifications, or preferences. Saving these changes ensures that Zigtal’s AI gives you accurate role matches, learning suggestions, and career recommendations. | Raktim Dutta
125.0 | What types of content are available in Learning Journey?
 What kind of learning materials and content formats can I access in the Zigtal Learning Journey module?
 Does the Learning Journey provide only online courses, or does it also include classroom programs and certifications? |  | Learning Journey |  | The Learning Journey module offers diverse formats including video modules, documents and

only online courses, or does it also include classroom programs and certifications? |  | Learning Journey |  | The Learning Journey module offers diverse formats including video modules, documents and clickable links to external learning sites. The learning modules are mapped to the skills taxonomy so that it is tailored to your role and skill requirements and thereby make learning more relevant and engaging | Raktim Dutta
126.0 | How do I enroll in a course in Learning Journey?
 What is the process for registering for a course on Zigtal?
 Where do I go to sign up for a new learning course in the Learning Journey? |  | Learning Journey |  | There are different ways to enroll in a Learning Journey.
 1. When you visit your Skills Analysis page you will be able to see the skill match percentage and Create Learning tab on the screen. Accordingly you will be able to create a learning journey
 2. You can also enrol into a Learning journey for the selected Aspiration career path | Raktim Dutta

127.0 | How do I attempt an assessment in Zigtal?
 Where do I start my assessment or test on Zigtal?
 What steps should I follow to begin an assigned test in Zigtal? |  | Assessment |  | There are different ways to enroll for an assessment
1. Go to My Skills page. You will find a tile called 'REQUEST ASSESSMENT'. You can request assessment for the particular skill through this tab
2. Alternatively, when you enrol for a Learning Journey, you will be able to attempt the assessments linked to the learning journey
128.0 | How do I upload my skills in Zigtal?
 Where can I add or update my skills on Zigtal?
 How do I submit my skills for analysis in Zigtal? |  | My Skills |  | You can upload your skills into your Zigtal account if your organization has given permission to edit employee skills. You may go to the 'MY SKILLS' tab and click on the 'Add Skill ' or 'Discover & Add Skill' Tile.
If you click on the Add Skill tile, you will get a pop up, where you can search for the skill by keying in the letters, followed by Self rating on the skill. Self rating will be mandatory when you are saving the skill
If you click on 'Discover & Add Skill' tile, you will get a pop up which will show yo

in the letters, followed by Self rating on the skill. Self rating will be mandatory when you are saving the skill
If you click on 'Discover & Add Skill' tile, you will get a pop up which will show you the following
- Skills that are already added
- Skills are the mapped to the job role
- Skills that your colleagues have endorsed
- Skills that are specific to the industry that you are in
- Custom skills that you had added earlier
- Skills that have been parsed from your resume, if you had uploaded one. You will find the feature of resume uploading when you scroll down the pop up page.
You can also add skills in this page by keying in the letters like the earlier process
129.0 | How is the skill match percentage calculated in Zigtal?
 What does the skill match % represent in Zigtal?
 How does Zigtal determine how closely my skills align with a role? |  | My Skills |  | Zigtal’s AI compares your listed and validated skills against role personas defined by your organization. It considers skill proficiency, skill weightages, assessment results, certifications, and recency of use to calculate a precise match percentage.

130.0 | What can Admins manage in Zigtal?
 What are the responsibilities and permissions of Admins in Zigtal?
 Can Admins manage programs and user access in Zigtal? |  | Admin |  | Admins manage user access, learning programs, assessments, role personas, and reporting dashboards. They maintain platform integrity, oversee configurations, and ensure smooth system operations.
131.0 | Can Admins assign mentors in Zigtal?
 Do Admins have the authority to approve or assign mentors to mentees?
 How do Admins manage mentor assignments in the Mentoring Hub? |  | Admin |  | Yes. Admins can nominate and assign mentors through the Mentoring Hub. They also configure mentor eligibility criteria, such as experience or expertise area, ensuring quality mentoring relationships.

l?
 Can I apply to become a mentor on Zigtal? |  | Mentoring |  | Zigtal's AI will automatically feature you as a Mentor if you have consistantly high rating in a particular skill. It also compares the skill criticality in your current role alongwith your individual skill rating to assign you as a Mentor
133.0 | Can employees map multiple career paths in Zigtal?
 Does Zigtal allow employees to explore different career tracks simultaneously?
 Can I plan alternative career paths within Zigtal’s Career Journey? |  | Career Path |  | Yes, employees can map multiple career paths based on the number of paths defined by your organization. AI engine at Zigtal, analyse the skil taxonomy of the applied role versus the current role and then recommends learning paths based on the skill gaps. The employees are able to opt for intra functional as well as cross functional roles in a lateral, vertical or diagonal career opportunities
134.0 | How are career paths recommended in Zigtal?
 What logic does Zigtal use to suggest career journeys to employees?
 Does Zigtal consider aspirations along with skills when recommending career paths? |  | Career Path |  | There are two ways with which the career

Zigtal use to suggest career journeys to employees?
 Does Zigtal consider aspirations along with skills when recommending career paths? |  | Career Path |  | There are two ways with which the career paths get initiated.
 The employee can go to the career path page at Zigtal where they can view the organizational career lattice. They can then go through the various roles in the career lattice and accordingly select their aspirational career path. 
 The AI engine at Zigtal, analyse the skil taxonomy of the applied role versus the current role and then recommends the percentage match of the aspirational roles.
 In both the above case the system creates a learning journey for the employees to upskill themselves in all the critical skills that are required for the aspirational role
